displacementae.grouprepr.prodrepr package¶

Submodules¶

displacementae.grouprepr.prodrepr.action_lookup module¶

Group representation of actions into a product of rotation matrices¶

Adapted from Quessard et al. 2020 <https://github.com/IndustAI/learning-group-structure>.

class displacementae.grouprepr.prodrepr.action_lookup.ActionLookup(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]¶

Bases: GroupRepresentation

forward(a: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Gets the representation matrix of input transition :arg:`a`.

act(a: torch.Tensor, z: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Acts on an input representation vector :arg:`z` through matrix product with the representation matrix of input transition :arg:`a`.

Args:
a, torch.Tensor: Batch of transitions.

shape: [batch_size,n_action]

z, torch.Tensor: Batch of representation vectors.

shape: [batch_size,n_repr]

Returns:
torch.Tensor: Transformed representation vectors.

shape: [batch_size,n_repr_units]
